docs.title: Welcome to django-adminlte-ui
docs.text:
django-adminlte is a django admin theme base on adminlte

adminlte version: 2.4.18

Since v2.0.0, all third part deps are removed except django.

old version docs is here: click

docs.title: Helper
docs.text:
• if you have good ideas, just contact me.
  • if you find some bug, just add an issue.
  • if you think this project is good, just star and fork, make it better 🍉.

docs.title: Install
docs.text: pip install django-adminlte-ui

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
# settings.py

INSTALLED_APPS = [
    'adminlteui',
    'django.contrib.admin',
    ...
]

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Custom General Option
  • Widgets
  • Custom Menu

docs.title: Thanks
docs.text:
• AdminLTE
  • django
  • django-suit

docs.title: v2.0.0
docs.text:
• remove django-treebeard deps, fix #28, #29, #30
  • remove all adminlte models, make simple
  • make all config base on core.AdminLteConfig

docs.title: Simple Example
docs.text: inherit adminlte.core.AdminlteConfig，and add ADMINLTE_CONFIG_CLASS in django settings

docs.title: Inherit AdminlteConfig
docs.text:
adminlte_config.py
# myserver/utils/adminlte_config.py
from adminlteui.core import AdminlteConfig
class MyAdminlteConfig(AdminlteConfig):
skin = 'red'
welcome_sign = 'welcome to xxx backend system'
...

docs.title: Settings in django
docs.text:
settings.py
ADMINLTE_CONFIG_CLASS = 'myserver.utils.adminlte_config.MyAdminlteConfig'

docs.title: show_avatar
docs.text: show avatar or not，default is False

docs.title: avatar_field
docs.text: avatar field or url，default is None，will render as adminlteui/static/admin/dist/img/default.jpg

docs.title: username_field
docs.text: username fields，default is None，will render as request.user.username

docs.title: site_logo
docs.text: site logo，default is None，will render as adminlteui/static/admin/dist/img/default-log.svg

docs.title: skin
docs.text: site skin，default is None，will render as blue

docs.title: sidebar_layout
docs.text: sidebar layout，default is fixed，choices：['boxed', 'fixed']

docs.title: search_form
docs.text: show search form or not，default is True

docs.title: copyright
docs.text: copyright，default is None，will render as django-adminlte-ui version

docs.title: welcome_sign
docs.text: welcome sign（login page），default is None，will render as 'Login and Enjoy'

docs.title: Menu
docs.text:
Menu inherit adminlte.core.MenuItem，you can modify the left menu and top menu

MenuItem has three type of menu_type

  • group：Group，you can make two or more MenuItem(model or link) in side the same menu level
  • model：bind model which registered in admin by label，label like app_label.modelName
  • link：normal link type，setup url direct

example adminlte_config.py

from adminlte.core import MenuItem
class MyAdminlteConfig(AdminlteConfig):
main_menu = [
MenuItem(label='rpa', name='RPA服务', child=[
MenuItem(label='rpa.Collector', menu_type='model'),
MenuItem(label='third', name='三级菜单', child=[
MenuItem(label='github', name='Github', url='https://github.com/wuyue92tree', target_blank=True, menu_type='link'),
]),
]),
MenuItem(label='auth', name='认证和授权', icon='fa-users', child=[
MenuItem(label='auth.User', name='用户', menu_type='model'), # (1)
MenuItem(label='auth.Group', name='组', menu_type='model'),
]),
]
top_menu = [
MenuItem(label='outside_link', name='外部资源', child=[
MenuItem(label='github', name='Github', url='https://github.com/wuyue92tree', target_blank=True, menu_type='link'),
]),
MenuItem(label='rpa.Collector', menu_type='model'),
]

effect

  1. when menu_type is model，if name not setup, will show the model verbose_name

docs.title: main_menu
docs.text:
main menu（left menu），default is []，will render as all registered model in admin

Tips: Support multilevel menu

docs.title: top_menu
docs.text:
top menu，default is []，will show nothing

Tips: Top menu will not show icon，only support secondary menu max

docs.title: ModelAdmin
docs.text:
external ModelAdmin in django

  • make table filter support select2 in change_list page
  • custom search field placeholder for change_list page

example admin.py

from adminlte.admin import ModelAdmin
class CollectorModelAdmin(ModelAdmin):
select2_list_filter = ('project', 'source') # (1)
search_field_placeholder = '描述/起始URL' # (2)
...

  1. add field in to this tuple which need select2 filter
  2. setup placeholder for search field

effect

docs.title: AdminlteSelect
docs.text:
Since v1.5.0b0, you don't need to modify new template to active select2.

example: rpa/admin.py

@admin.register(Collector)
class CollectorAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
...
formfield_overrides = {
models.ForeignKey: {'widget': AdminlteSelect}
}
effect:

docs.title: AdminlteSelectMultiple
docs.text:
Since v1.5.0b0, you don't need to modify new template to active select2.

example: rpa/admin.py

@admin.register(Collector)
class CollectorAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
...
formfield_overrides = {
# multiple for ManayToManyField
models.ManayToManyField: {'widget': AdminlteSelectMultiple(
attr={'style': 'width: 100%'}
)}
}
effect:

docs.title: 欢迎使用 django-adminlte-ui
docs.text:
django-adminlte 是一个基于adminlte的django后台管理系统主题

adminlte 版本: 2.4.18

从 v2.0.0 版本开始, django-adminlte移除了所有除django以外的依赖包.

老版本(1.x)文档: 点击

docs.title: 帮助进步
docs.text:
• 如果你有好的点子，请联系我
  • 如果你发现了碧油鸡，请添加 issue.
  • 如果你认为这个项目不错，请不要吝啬您的start，积极fork，让项目更好吧🍉

docs.title: 安装
docs.text: pip install django-adminlte-ui

docs.title: 设置
docs.text:
# settings.py

INSTALLED_APPS = [
    'adminlteui',
    'django.contrib.admin',
    ...
]

docs.title: 功能
docs.text:
• 自定义属性
  • Widget组件
  • 自定义菜单

docs.title: 鸣谢
docs.text:
• AdminLTE
  • django
  • django-suit

docs.title: v2.0.0
docs.text:
• 移除 django-treebeard 依赖包, 同时修复 #28, #29, #30
  • 移除了所有models，不再通过数据库的方式管理自定义菜单及其他选项
  • 所有特性均通过继承core.AdminLteConfig类来实现

docs.title: 简单的示例
docs.text: 通过继承adminlte.core.AdminlteConfig，并在django的settings中添加配置实现

docs.title: 继承AdminlteConfig
docs.text:
adminlte_config.py
# myserver/utils/adminlte_config.py
from adminlteui.core import AdminlteConfig
class MyAdminlteConfig(AdminlteConfig):
skin = 'red'
welcome_sign = '欢迎访问xxx后端系统'
...

docs.title: django中settings配置
docs.text:
settings.py
ADMINLTE_CONFIG_CLASS = 'myserver.utils.adminlte_config.MyAdminlteConfig'

docs.title: show_avatar
docs.text: 是否显示头像，默认为False

docs.title: avatar_field
docs.text: 头像对应的url或者用户头像字段，默认为None，将渲染为adminlteui/static/admin/dist/img/default.jpg

docs.title: username_field
docs.text: 用户名显示，默认为None，将渲染为request.user.username

docs.title: site_logo
docs.text: 站点logo，默认为None，将渲染为adminlteui/static/admin/dist/img/default-log.svg

docs.title: skin
docs.text: 站点主题，默认为None，将渲染为blue

docs.title: sidebar_layout
docs.text: 侧边栏布局，默认为fixed，可选：['boxed', 'fixed']

docs.title: search_form
docs.text: 是否显示搜索框，默认为True

docs.title: copyright
docs.text: 版权，默认为None，将渲染为django-adminlte-ui版本号

docs.title: welcome_sign
docs.text: 欢迎标志（登录页），默认为None，将渲染为芝麻开门

docs.title: 菜单
docs.text:
菜单通过继承adminlte.core.MenuItem实现，可对左侧菜单及顶部菜单进行自定义

MenuItem有三种menu_type

  • group：分组，用于将多个model或link类型的MenuItem显示到同一级菜单中
  • model：通过label绑定通过admin中注册的model页面，label命名规则app_label.modelName
  • link：普通链接类型，直接通过url指定链接

示例 adminlte_config.py

from adminlte.core import MenuItem
class MyAdminlteConfig(AdminlteConfig):
main_menu = [
MenuItem(label='rpa', name='RPA服务', child=[
MenuItem(label='rpa.Collector', menu_type='model'),
MenuItem(label='third', name='三级菜单', child=[
MenuItem(label='github', name='Github', url='https://github.com/wuyue92tree', target_blank=True, menu_type='link'),
]),
]),
MenuItem(label='auth', name='认证和授权', icon='fa-users', child=[
MenuItem(label='auth.User', name='用户', menu_type='model'), # (1)
MenuItem(label='auth.Group', name='组', menu_type='model'),
]),
]
top_menu = [
MenuItem(label='outside_link', name='外部资源', child=[
MenuItem(label='github', name='Github', url='https://github.com/wuyue92tree', target_blank=True, menu_type='link'),
]),
MenuItem(label='rpa.Collector', menu_type='model'),
]

效果图

  1. menu_type类型为model时，若不指定name，则默认显示为原model的verbose_name

docs.title: main_menu
docs.text:
主菜单（左侧菜单），默认为[]，将渲染为所有已注册到admin中的model

Tips: 可实现多级菜单

docs.title: top_menu
docs.text:
顶部菜单，默认为[]，将渲染为空

Tips: 顶部菜单将不显示Icon，并且最多显示二级菜单，多余的将被隐藏

docs.title: ModelAdmin
docs.text:
扩展django的ModelAdmin

  • 让change_list页面的table过滤器支持select2
  • 自定义change_list页面搜索框的placeholder提示

示例 admin.py

from adminlte.admin import ModelAdmin
class CollectorModelAdmin(ModelAdmin):
select2_list_filter = ('project', 'source') # (1)
search_field_placeholder = '描述/起始URL' # (2)
...

  1. 将需要使用select2的筛选fields加入该tuple中
  2. 将待显示的搜索框提示信息赋值

效果图

docs.title: AdminlteSelect
docs.text:
自 v1.5.0b0 版本之后, 将不再需要通过template覆盖的方式激活select2.

示例: rpa/admin.py

@admin.register(Collector)
class CollectorAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
...
formfield_overrides = {
models.ForeignKey: {'widget': AdminlteSelect}
}
效果图:

docs.title: AdminlteSelectMultiple
docs.text:
自 v1.5.0b0 版本之后, 将不再需要通过template覆盖的方式激活select2.

示例: rpa/admin.py

@admin.register(Collector)
class CollectorAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
...
formfield_overrides = {
# multiple for ManayToManyField
models.ManayToManyField: {'widget': AdminlteSelectMultiple(
attr={'style': 'width: 100%'}
)}
}
效果图:
